rooms.name: Grand Entry
rooms.description: You are in the Grand Entry. The front door is to the North, but it's locked. There are stairs leading downstairs to the South. There are two sets of stairs leading upwards on either side of the downward stairs(SouthEast and SouthWest). To the East, there is a dinning room. To the West, there is a hallway. ADD DESCRIPTION(painting)

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: You are in the dining room. You see three magenta chairs around a round table decorated by a candle. The kitchen is to the South. The Grand Entry is to the West.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You are in the kitchen. The dining room is to the North. There is a hallway to the East. A pantry is to the SouthWest. ADD DESCRIPTION

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: You are in the closet. It is dark.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You are in a rundown kitchen you can see a fridge with its door hanging open.
